Package edu.cnm.deepdive.tetris.model

Class Block

java.lang.Object
edu.cnm.deepdive.tetris.model.Block
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public class Block extends Object implements Cloneable
Implements the functional characteristics and behavior of a single Tetris shape.
